column5: Well much can't be said about this years opener. Great water conditons up north. The rain from Thrusday Friday was light making perfect water color. 3'rd year fishing this river on the opener and every year is a prize. Lots of chrome post spawn females. One after another non stop action . Me and 3 buddies each took 1 fish home and released all the others.  Here's some highlights. Picks are from both days.
Nice report... Looks like everyone's eating trout tonight eh lol
nice bit of steel there wtg
Nice report you guys did well considering the shoulder to shoulder competition.
Sweet! Great job out there...esp since it was very crowded there.  congrats on a great opener!

Thanks guys...personally I like it better when there are crouds. It defenitely separates the men from the boy's !!! And its always good for a laugh with my buddies over some of the loogens that come out of the wood work on the opener.
Nice Fish! Keep the reports coming, and after reading all these chrome reports im am heading out this week to give it a go!
good stuff, some nice clean lookin fish...
Good going there bud   bring one over on Friday night.
